content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]

  • 12 channels with up to 16MP resolution
  • 2.4GHz/5GHz WiFi (with WiFi 6 support)
  • WiFi 6 delivers up to 25% faster data transfer compared to WiFi 5
  • With 4 external antennas for excellent signal strength, covers up to 1000m2
  • WPA3 encryption for protection of your data and privacy
  • Stable HD live view. BSS colour technology improves network immunity, even in multi-device network environments, so you can always enjoy stable UHD video streaming
  • Supports 24/7 recording. Can work independently without internet, completely offline. Recorded videos can be safely stored on the pre-installed 2TB hard drive (expandable up to 16TB) without data loss or data leakage
  • Easy installation
  • The NVR is compatible with various Reolink IP cameras (both WiFi and PoE) and can connect up to 12 cameras
  • With Reolink app or Client you can watch live streams, playback and adjust settings
  • IP video input: up to 12 IP cameras
  • Audio input: cameras with built-in microphone
  • Video output: VGS, HDMI
  • Display resolution: HDMI: 3840×2160, 1920×1080, 1280×1024, 1280×720, 1024×768 / VGA: 1920×1080, 1280×1024, 1280×720, 1024×768
  • Audio output: 1CH, RCA
  • Video compression: H.265/H.264
  • Dimensions (WxHxD): 255 x 49.5 x 222.7 mm
  • Weight (without HDD): 1.4 kg

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered:
12-Channel Wi-Fi 6 NVR Recorder for 24/7 Local Recordings

  • 12 Channels with Max. 12MP Resolution
  • 5/2.4 GHz Wi-Fi with Wi-Fi 6 Supported
  • Local Recording & Storage
  • Pre-installed 2TB HDD
